description:
Taikoubou and his friends get caught in Mount Kunlun`s defense system, making each person face their worst fears. Genshitenson appears before Taikoubou`s group and reveals the real truth behind the Houshin Project.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genshitenson, Taikoubou ni Mirai o Miseru Koto
元始天尊, 太公望に未来を見せる事
